hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### Latest as of Oct 2018
### start initializing - deleting old files ==============
#Remove all CSV files (.csv): rm -rf /extra/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/GBIF_taxa_csv_dwca/*
#Remove multimedia assignments to taxon (.txt): rm -rf /extra/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/multimedia_gbifID/*
#Remove all map data (.json) rm -rf /extra/map_data_dwca/*
### start DwCA downloads ================================= worked OK
#OK cd /extra/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/DwCA_Animalia/ ##rm -f Animalia_DwCA.zip ##curl -L -o 'Animalia_DwCA.zip' -C - http://api.gbif.org/v1/occurrence/download/request/0012668-181003121212138.zip ##unzip -jo Animalia_DwCA.zip multimedia.txt ##unzip -jo Animalia_DwCA.zip occurrence.txt
#OK cd /extra/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/DwCA_Plantae/ ##rm -f Plantae_DwCA.zip ##curl -L -o 'Plantae_DwCA.zip' -C - http://api.gbif.org/v1/occurrence/download/request/0012669-181003121212138.zip ##unzip -jo Plantae_DwCA.zip multimedia.txt ##unzip -jo Plantae_DwCA.zip occurrence.txt
#OK cd /extra/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/DwCA_Other7Groups/ ##rm -f Other7Groups_DwcA.zip ##curl -L -o 'Other7Groups_DwcA.zip' -C - http://api.gbif.org/v1/occurrence/download/request/0012209-181003121212138.zip ##unzip -jo Other7Groups_DwcA.zip multimedia.txt ##unzip -jo Other7Groups_DwcA.zip occurrence.txt
